portfolio.title: Ride Ready
portfolio.description: (In Progress) An application that lets users see the current status of mountain bike trails, get directions, and lets trail maintainers provide information. Utilizes React functional components, hooks, state, various APIs, and Firebase data storage.

portfolio.title: Photography E-Commerce
portfolio.description: (Coming Soon) An e-commerce website to host, display, and sell personal photography i've taken as a hobby. Clean, elegant, and simple. Functioning cart and payment processor.

portfolio.title: Machine Learning Portal
portfolio.description: (School Project - Needs Work) A website where users can browse through Machine Learning topics and assets like: websites, blogs, videos, and more to learn about the different aspects of Machine Learning. Supports CRUD functionality and authentication.
